login.title: this is the signin page
login.linkToLogin: Go back to login page, click here.
login.emailNotVerifiedMessage: Email address is not verified. Please check your email for the verification link. if you have not received the link, you can resend the verification link from here:

verify.title: Resend email verification code
verify.resendVerifyDescription: Enter your email where the verification is send.

register.title: Create a new account and start learning
register.success: New user created successfully with email address {{email}}. We sent you a verify link by email, please verify it. Redirecting to login page.
register.linkToLogin: If page does not redirect automatically, click here
register.cancelSuccessDisplay: If you want to return to the register form, click here

errors.invalidLanguageIdError: Language id selected does not exists.
errors.connectionError: Something went wrong, check your connection and try again.
errors.usernameInUseError: Username is already in use, select another one.
errors.emailInUseError: Email is already in use, select another one.
errors.memberFeatureError: This feature is available only to members.
errors.emailNotVerifiedError: Your email address is not verified.
errors.bugMessageTooShortError: Bug message must be at least {{length}} characters long.
errors.bugMessageTooLongError: Bug message maximum length is {{length}} characters.
errors.bugSolveMessageTooShortError: Bug solve message must be at least {{length}} characters long.
errors.bugSolveMessageTooLongError: Bug solve message maximum length is {{length}} characters.
errors.nonExistingDeckIdError: Deck with id {{id}} does not exist.
errors.passwordMismatchError: Password and confirmation do not match
errors.passwordNumberError: Password must contain at least one number.
errors.passwordUppercaseError: Password must contain at least one upper case letter.
errors.passwordLowercaseError: Password must contain at least one lower case letter.
errors.passwordMinLengthError: Password must be at least {{length}} characters long.
errors.currAndNewPassEqualError: Old and new passwords cannot be equal.
errors.usernameMaxLengthError: Username can be maximum {{length}} characters long
errors.usernameMinLengthError: Username must be at least {{length}} character long
errors.tosNotChecked: Please agree with the terms of service.
